```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
```

```{r download the dev version since }
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github('ropensci/pangaear')
library('pangaear')
```

```{r Optional Search for Data}
#pg_search(query, count = 10, offset = 0, topic = NULL, bbox = NULL, mindate = NULL, maxdate = NULL, ...)
pangaear::pg_search(query = 'water', bbox = c(-124.2, 41.8, -116.8, 46.1), count = 3)
```


```{r get data}
doi = "10.1594/PANGAEA.807580"
dat <- pangaear::pg_data(doi = doi)
dat[[1]]

```
```{r get filename}
gsub(".")

```



```{r Open the data}
rappdirs::user_cache_dir("pangaear")
list.files(rappdirs::user_cache_dir("pangaear")) # List files in the directory that pangea wrote to. 
```

```{r get Metadata}
pangaear::pg_list_metadata_formats()
```
